# Status Bar Item Length

**API Collection**

Constants used by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSStatusBar/statusItem(withLength:)] method.

## Constants

- **squareLength**: A status item length that is equal to the status bar’s thickness.
- **variableLength**: A status item length that dynamically adjusts to the width of its contents.

items.description: A status item length that is equal to the status bar’s thickness.

items.description: A status item length that dynamically adjusts to the width of its contents.
